text: Godefridus Adrianus Quirinus "Frits" Niessen (16 September 1936 â€“ 23 October 2020) was a Dutch teacher and politician. He was in the House of Representatives for the Labour Party between 1977 and 1978 and once more from 1980 to 1994. Niesden was born in Raamsdonk and died in Raamsdonksveer (both in the municipality of Geertruidenberg) at the age of 84. ==References== == Other websites == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch teachers Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Frits Niessen
